question: In which nation "Sabana-Camaguey Archipelago" is located?
explanation: Sabana-Camaguey Archipelago is located in north-central coast of Cuba facing the Atlantic Ocean. It is bounded by the Nicholas Channel and the Old Bahamas Channel. Environment Canada and the Global Environment Facility support different conservation projects to protect the coastal and marine ecosystem of this archipelago. It houses Bay of Buena Vista Biosphere Reserve and Caguanes National Park.
